projects.title: Full-Stack Web & SEO Architect at Welup Digital
projects.description: Built and fine-tuned Welup Digital’s core platforms for top-notch SEO, speed, and UX. Also crafted and optimized client sites, boosting traffic and online impact with smart, modern web strategies.

projects.title: SEO & Growth Specialist at PromptEarn
projects.description: Drove a 250% boost in organic traffic for PromptEarn with advanced SEO, Core Web Vitals optimization, and affiliate growth—achieving top 5 keyword rankings and a 45% sales increase.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A minimalist portfolio website showcasing projects and skills with a clean, responsive design and smooth animations.

projects.title: WordPress Developer at The Wealthy Post
projects.description: Revamped The Wealthy Post’s website with advanced WordPress techniques, boosting engagement and organic traffic through responsive design, SEO, and performance optimization.

projects.title: Corporate Website for Dubiss Forex Academy
projects.description: Built a modern, trust-focused website for Dubiss Forex Academy, highlighting their global reach, educational programs, and client testimonials. Enhanced credibility and user engagement with a clean, professional design.

projects.title: Corporate Website for Craigwal Petreshore
projects.description: Developed a robust corporate site for Craigwal Petreshore, showcasing engineering, procurement, and construction capabilities. Integrated downloadable company profile and clear service breakdowns.

projects.title: Corporate Website for New Hampshire Capital
projects.description: Designed and built a modern site for New Hampshire Capital, highlighting their expertise in asset management, infrastructure, and energy projects. Focused on clarity, trust, and sector impact.

projects.title: Corporate Website for Urabus Renewable Energies
projects.description: Developed a clean, mission-driven website for Urabus Renewable Energies, focusing on their impact in healthcare, mobility, and sustainability. Showcased projects, testimonials, and SDG alignment.

projects.title: Corporate Website for Aristeia Properties
projects.description: Built a visually engaging site for Aristeia Properties, emphasizing their mission, vision, and core values. Enhanced investor trust and showcased real estate expertise.

projects.title: Lead Developer at Kyrus Recycling
projects.description: Led a team to build a recycling web app that incentivizes users to recycle waste for rewards. Delivered the MVP in 3 months, driving 500+ user sign-ups in the first month.
